EightShapes designs desktop and mobile experiences for web sites, intranets, and applications.

What We Do

Full Service User Experience Design

Our clients hire us to design solutions that meet the needs of their business and their users. Our projects are structured to be collaborative, intense, and sensitive to their constraints.

  • Design Strategy
  • Interaction Design
  • Information Architecture
  • Visual Design
  • Prototyping
  • Content
  • Research
  • HTML & CSS

How We Do It

  • Visualizing ideas quickly

    From the moment we start a project, we visualize ideas via sketches & brainstorming.

  • Prototyping in the browser

    We demonstrate interactions, style, structure and content through HTML prototypes.

  • Communicating transparently

    Communicating honestly, openly & directly is the basis of successful teams.

  • Involving users in the process

    Contributions from actual users is the best way to ensure designs meet their needs.

Who We Are

Inquisitive. Friendly. Honest.

We're insatiably curious about business, customers, and design challenges. We prioritize a warm, collaborative environment. And we believe that both of those things depend on a commitment to openness and transparency.

  • Nathan Curtis

    Principal & Founder

  • Dan Brown

    Principal & Founder

  • Chris Detzi

    Sr. Director, User Experience

  • James Melzer

    Director, User Experience

  • Kevin Powell

    Sr. Front End Developer

Thinkers & do-ers.

Big thinking means nothing without action. There's time enough for ideas, but we get our hands dirty: mucking in code, tweaking photography, and gauging the timing of an interaction.

Experts & educators.

Our clients value the depth of our experience and our approach to brainstorming ideas, but we welcome everyone to the design process. We encourage participation.

Planning & flexibility.

As new requirements emerge, priorities shift, and unexpected constraints materialize, we don't lose a step and work with you to adapt our plan.
